name: BasketballQuestions
0:
”Alexa, open basketball questions”
”Alexa, launch basketball questions”
”Alexa, start basketball questions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: basketball questions
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Basketball Questions" is an Alexa skill designed to test your general basketball knowledge by playing both alone and with others.

Users are asked general basketball questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no." Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.

The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.

In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.

Try the multiplayer mode, challenge your family and friends and find out who will be the winner!!! 

Have fun!
